title: 820-00165 not turning on
message:
Hey buddy, I've got this mac that's been repaired, the U5110 has been replaced and components next to it. In the tests the safe is swaying in green and orange and the cooler does not rotate.


Voltage: PPbus_g3h 8.60V; PP3v42_g3h 3.41V; ALL_SYS_PWRGD_R 0V; oscillates (PP5v_s0 0 ~ 1.2V; SMC_PM_G2_EN 0V ~ 3.42).

title: 820-00165 not turning on
message:
Surely no pulse at all at ALL_SYS_PWRGD?
Which other big coils pulse, apart of L7520?

title: 820-00165 not turning on
message:
ALL_SYS_PWRGD0V;


L7130 PPVBAT_G3H_CHGR_REG / CHGR_PHASE 8,56 / 8,74 V
L7520 P5V_S4RS3_REG_L / PP5V_S4RS3 0V
L7560 P3V3_S5_REG_L / PP3V3_S5_REG_R 1.7 ~ 3.2V oscilando
L7430 PDDR_S3_REG_L / PPDDR_S3_REG_R 0,02V
L7630 P1V05S0_LL / PP1V05_S0_REG_R 0.02V
L7310 PPVCC_S0_CPU_PH1 / CPUVR_PHASE1 0v
L7320 PPVCC_S0_CPU_PH2 / CPUVR_PHASE2 0v

title: 820-00165 not turning on
message:
Please, find a better way to translate your messages, if you need help.
I cannot help properly, if I cannot understand your messages.

What this really means???
"the safe is swaying in green and orange"
Do you get steady orange light?
Probably not (nut not sure) and check SMC_RESET_L.
If not steady high, you still have problems around U5110; post its voltages...

title: 820-00165 not turning on
message: sorry, i'm looking for other translators to make my problem easier to understand.  "the safe is swaying in green and orange".  it means that the led light is oscillating between green and red. when i get to the service i will check SMC_RESET_L.  I apologize again for not being able to translate Portuguese to English correctly.

title: 820-00165 not turning on
message:
SMC_RESET_L 3.31V
U5110:
1- 3,42V
2- GND
3- 3,43V
4- 2.94V
5 - 3,27V
6- 3,41V
7 - 3,42V
8 - 2,95V.

When you trigger SMC_ONOFF_L the magsafe light turns green.

title: 820-00165 not turning on
message:
"When you trigger SMC_ONOFF_L the magsafe light turns green."
Looks like SMC reset.
Are you working with the board alone on the desk?
Disconnect trackpad and use R5115/16 pads instead...

title: 820-00165 not turning on
message:
''Are you working with the board alone on the desk? ''
only with the bench plate.

title: 820-00165 not turning on
message: SMC_RESET_L is steady high, when you trigger SMC_ONOFF_L?

title: 820-00165 not turning on
message: When you trigger SMC_ONOFF_L , the voltage SMC_RESET_L remains high.

title: 820-00165 not turning on
message: Magsafe light still switch from orange to green then?

title: 820-00165 not turning on
message:
"Magsafe light still switch from orange to green then?" no, it stabilized. after I checked it had broken tracks near U5110, the magsafe light stabilized. 
I noticed that pp3v3_sus is between 0V and 1V oscillating and the u7840 component is oxidizing, will it be the defect ?

title: 820-00165 not turning on
message:
You must clean/replace each oxidized component.

3V3_S5 is now stable?
Post again voltages, after you've got Magsafe light steady.

title: 820-00165 not turning on
message:
PP3V3_S5 instable
[QUOTE="2informaticos, post: 61771, member: 682"]
You must clean/replace each oxidized component.
[/QUOTE]
okay

title: 820-00165 not turning on
message: Post U7501 basic voltages; pins 23, 12, 13, 22, 29, 21.

title: 820-00165 not turning on
message:
23- oscillates between 8.55 and 8.59V
12 - oscillating, I can't know what value
13- oscillating tb between 1.7 and 0.9V
22- 3.28V
29 - oscillating between 4 and 3.7V
21- oscillating between 1.7 and 3.3V

title: 820-00165 not turning on
message:
Did you eliminate all the corrosion?
Also replace affected components...

title: 820-00165 not turning on
message: had oxidized components near the SMC, I'm going to do the SMC reball.

title: 820-00165 not turning on
message: Always reball SMC, when you detect liquid sign around it.

title: 820-00165 not turning on
message: resolved after running the SMC again, on the first attempt, I think there was a missing component sold, because it gave 8.18V in the PPBUS, I redid it again as sold and solved.  Thank you friend !!!
